name: Ralph Bill
description: I am a simple and easy going person. a single widower, always with my little son because he is my only companion and best friend.I appreciate nature and adventure.I live a simple life.I’m a passionate lover,a committed partner.I like reading motivational and passionate books, singing, dancing.I like traveling and I like jazz, R&B and rock music.I play my part in everything i get involve with.I want to be your friend and maybe from there we can see where this will lead us to.I want to see if i can find my love in your arms.I am here because i have been leaving a life without care and love since the death of my wife.,,,I’m looking for someone that will bring joy to my life once again and also a caring and faithful woman that both will be there for each other always.There is no one on earth more serious about finding love and successful partner than i am and you can count on that.The success of loving another person is the kind of success I am seeking today. The richness of caring for another woman is what I am looking for now. Would love to find someone with whom I could share the lessons I have learned.I am extremely passionate about continuing to actively create the most amazing, dynamic and awesome life possible. Would love to find a partner who gets what I am talking about to actively create an amazing life together!
